paragraphs.en: I've always had a passion for computers. My main hobby growing up was fixing and building them. I later discovered my passion for programming while in college. The work I do consists of building web applications, internal tools, npm packages, and maintenance for our existing products. Most of my free time is spent in coffee shops learning more about web development and recently mobile app development.

paragraphs.en: When I'm not coding, you'll find me hiking, exploring a new city, at a brewery, gaming, biking or skating.

paragraphs.en: I've worked with many different technologies over the last few years. Below is a list of technologies I'm familiar with.
